plot: Daichi Kakeru is a sixteen-year-old high school student who has never had a girlfriend. Little did he know that everything was about to change when he bought a melon soda on his way home from school. His first sip became his first kiss, as the can came to life in the form of a beautiful girl, whom he calls "Melon". The can is part of a government project called "Akikan", where certain empty cans turn into beautiful girls.
opening_theme: "Miracle Plan ga Dekichatta!" (ミラクル♡プランができちゃった!) by CHARMY♡QUEEN (eps 1-6)
